text:
The WORST THERE IS.
Customer Service based on Holidays schedule not 24 hours. I have a tax payment to make and their ChatBot is simply primitive (for lack of an ugly word) and to request for online payment and contactless delivery is Magic to these cavemen.
It's utterly Robbery in Broad Daylight when my household were coierced to make payment or my parcel is delayed for maybe 10 years despite customers were treated as if we owe them a living and to kiss their feet when WE are the hands that feeds them.
If the company closes down I make sure I'm the first to post the nastiest comment!

This is my 1st time using DHL Service, as my client from USA  insists on only using DHL Delivery. Thank You for the counter service at  DHL 1 Tai Seng , by 1 Indian Mdm. The service is smooth, fast and friendly. Highly Recommended. Next time, I will just come over here to send parcels for Oversea clients .
Excellent service when I was in a hurry to send a package of foodstuffs to Botswana. Staff helped me optimise the number of items and weight to save costs.
Amazing service, the staff is very professional. They treated me very nicely and did their job superb. Thanks DHL.

Their online tracking website has options for different types of contactless delivery if preferred. Otherwise, recipient signature together with pictures of delivery will be sent to designated buyer.  So far very pleased with DHLâ€™s service.
